snippet: NATO did not confirm the nationality of the victims, but a spokesman for the governor of Helmand Province said that they were British soldiers.

byline.contributor: Taimoor Shah contributed reporting from Kabul, and an employee of The New York Times from Helmand Province.

lead_paragraph: NATO did not confirm the nationality of the victims, but a spokesman for the governor of Helmand Province said that they were British soldiers.

headline.seo: Gunmen in Afghan Police Uniforms Kill 2 NATO Soldiers
headline.main: Gunmen in Afghan Police Uniforms Kill 2 NATO Soldiers
headline.print_headline: Gunmen in Afghan Police Uniforms Kill 2 NATO Soldiers
